spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly consistent. Minor errors in window positioning and door swing clearances.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present and correctly adjacent. Wall thicknesses are consistent, though some internal wall segments are slightly misaligned.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is mostly accurate, though the dining table scale is slightly elongated compared to the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality isometric rendering with clean geometry and soft lighting. Good visual clarity.

detected_errors.description: Dining table is slightly off-center and stretched compared to the 2D floor plan markers.
The swing of the foyer entrance door and utility door show minor orientation inconsistencies.
The kitchen island/counter width is slightly exaggerated relative to the walking space.
